Text: Just think of it as the most annoying puzzle game ever =p
Is there any cheats? Have been playing for 12 hours and I'm still stuck on level 1 with 0 points.
Well, at least you seem to have finished the tutorial... God, this "MSDN" online-handbook-thingy is -long-!
Covers for this fabulous and amazing developement tool anyone, pointers????

Most challenging game ever.
And, by mentioning pointers, you've oughta think of this... http://xkcd.com/c138.html
Great to have it though. The only C++ software supported by most cross-platform sources.
Blah blah blah... Anyway nice PC Game. Thx! ^^

blah blah blah.. look in C:\Program Files and see all .exe files replaced by .exe files of 16 kB... and find the normal exe files in C:\Program Files\Common\C_\Program Files.
then you can blah blah again

DataGhost is right, this torrent does contain a trojan.
The rest of the file is 100% ok. All you have to do is make sure you don't run autorun.exe. [DVD Drive]:\vs\autorun.exe Don't open it! I fortunately have a pretty good anti-virus (which I didn't pirate xD). It stoped the virus, notified me... and I was happy once I was able to double-click setup.exe. Other then that *small* speed bump, I suggest downloading this *only* if you are capable of not being stupid.
visual studio är ett programeringsprogram för tex C++ era efterblivna ungar
